mapper.insert: insert into dtb_donation_req (id,periodStart, periodStop, password, title, content, address) values (#{id}, #{periodStart}, #{periodStop}, #{password}, #{title}, #{content}, #{address})
mapper.update: update dtb_donation_req set period = #{period}, password = #{password}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, address = #{address}, progress = #{progress}, where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select * from dtb_donation_req where no > 0 order by no desc
